 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּשׁ‎</span> **verb** ==be sick==, si vera lectio (= I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אנשׁ‎</span> according to [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] who compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָָֽאָנוּשָׁה‎</span> [[Ps.69.21|Ps 69:21]], but read perhaps [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַכַּת נַפְשִׁי‎</span>] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַאֲנוּשָׁה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ׅ‎</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(חֶרְפָּה שָׁ֑בְרָה לִבִּי‎</span>, [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>critical note</sup>, compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]], see I.<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אנשׁ‎</span> or (&lt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַוֹּה‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאָנוּשׁ הוּא קַוֵּה‎</span> (with different word-division), Weir<sup>Acad. 1870, 257</sup> (who compare [[Jer.17.9|Jer 17:9]]; [[Jer.8.15|Jer 8:15]]).
